mapper.select: SELECT tvr.VOLUN_REQUEST_NO, tvr.VOLUN_REQUEST_NAME, tv.VOLUN_TITLE, tv.VOLUN_REGIDATE, tvr.MEMBER_NO, tm.MEMBER_NICKNAME, tvr.VOLUN_REQUEST_AGREEMENT , CASE WHEN tvr.VOLUN_REQUEST_AGREEMENT = 'Y' THEN '수락' WHEN tvr.VOLUN_REQUEST_AGREEMENT = 'N' THEN '거절' ELSE '심사중' END AS volunStatus FROM TBL_VOLUN_REQUEST tvr LEFT JOIN TBL_VOLUN tv ON tv.VOLUN_NO = tvr.VOLUN_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tvr.MEMBER_NO = tm.MEMBER_NO WHERE tvr.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = #{centerMemberNo}

SELECT tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_NO, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_NAME, ta.ADOPT_TITLE, ta.ADOPT_REGIDATE, tar.MEMBER_NO, tm.MEMBER_NICKNAME, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_STATUS, CASE WHEN tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_STATUS = 'Y' THEN '수락' WHEN tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_STATUS = 'N' THEN '거절' ELSE '심사중' END AS adoptStatus FROM TBL_ADOPT_REQUEST tar LEFT JOIN TBL_ADOPT ta ON ta.ADOPT_NO = tar.ADOPT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tm.MEMBER_NO = tar.MEMBER_NO WHERE tar.CENTER_MEMBER_NO = #{centerMemberNo}

SELECT tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_NO, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_NAME, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_PHONE, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_PHONE_SUB, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_EMAIL, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_GENDER, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_AGE, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_ZIPCODE, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_ADDRESS, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_ADDRESS_DETAIL, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_JOB, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_MARRY, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_INFO_AGREEMENT, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q1, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q2, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q3, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q4, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q5, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q6, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q7, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q8, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q9, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q10, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q11, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q12, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q13, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q14, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_Q15, tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_ADOPT_AGREEMENT, tar.ADOPT_NO, tar.MEMBER_NO, tar.CENTER_MEMBER_NO, ta.ADOPT_TITLE, ta.ADOPT_REGIDATE, tm.MEMBER_NICKNAME , tcm.CENTER_MEMBER_NAME , tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_STATUS FROM TBL_ADOPT_REQUEST tar LEFT JOIN TBL_ADOPT ta ON tar.ADOPT_NO = ta.ADOPT_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_MEMBER tm ON tar.MEMBER_NO = tm.MEMBER_NO LEFT JOIN TBL_CENTER_MEMBER tcm ON tar.CENTER_MEMBER_NO =tcm.CENTER_MEMBER_NO WHERE tar.ADOPT_REQUEST_NO = #{adoptRequestNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ADOPT_REQUEST SET ADOPT_REQUEST_STATUS = #{adoptRequestStatus} -- 'Y'는 승인 WHERE ADOPT_REQUEST_NO = #{adoptRequestNo} -- 특정 신청서 번호로 조건 설정
